snippet: President Omar al-Bashir of Sudan has agreed to meet with President Salva Kiir Miyardeit of South Sudan on Friday in Ethiopia to discuss border security and oil sharing.
abstract: Sudanese Pres Omar al-Bashir agrees to meet with South Sudanese Pres Salva Kiir Miyardeit in Ethiopia to discuss border security and oil sharing.
lead_paragraph: President Omar al-Bashir of Sudan has agreed to meet with President Salva Kiir Miyardeit of South Sudan on Friday in Ethiopia to discuss border security and oil sharing.

headline.main: Sudan and South Sudan Leaders Agree to Meet
headline.print_headline: Sudan and South Sudan Leaders Agree to Meet
